医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Bedfont® Scientific Limited 通过新注册为沙特阿拉伯带来尖端呼吸和胃肠道诊断解决方案随着 NObreath® FeNO 和 Gastrolyzer® 设备的推出，Bedfont® 和 Tebaba Medical Services 正在中东地区推进呼吸分析技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Brings-Cutting-Edge-Respiratory-and-Gastrointestinal-Diagnostic-Solutions-to-Saudi-Arabia-with-New-Registration。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Brings-Cutting-Edge-Respiratory-and-Gastrointestinal-Diagnostic-Solutions-to-Saudi-Arabia-with-New-Registration。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03ea47a6-b9d3-4686-adb0-597120a0985c Tue, 03 Dec 2024 08:22:00 -0500 Bedfont® Scientific Limited Brings Cutting-Edge Respiratory and Gastrointestinal Diagnostic Solutions to Saudi Arabia with New Registration
Orbit Discovery 和 Evergreen Theragnostics 扩大研究合作，推进靶向治疗药物开发领先的肽发现服务提供商 Orbit Discovery 和处于精准医学前沿的放射性制药公司 Evergreen Theragnostics 今天宣布扩大他们的研究合作，以寻找用于放射性药物输送的新型靶向肽。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Orbit-Discovery-and-Evergreen-Theragnostics-expand-research-collaboration-to-advance-targeted-therapeutics-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Orbit-Discovery-and-Evergreen-Theragnostics-expand-research-collaboration-to-advance-targeted-therapeutics-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37878930-6542-48c3-8cd9-a7aef534495b Tue, 03 Dec 2024 07:09:00 -0500 Orbit Discovery and Evergreen Theragnostics expand research collaboration to advance targeted therapeutics development
影响慢性肺曲霉病患者死亡率的关键危险因素一项系统综述显示，慢性肺曲霉病死亡率是由年龄和基础疾病驱动的，这凸显了靶向治疗的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Key-risk-factors-influencing-mortality-rates-in-chronic-pulmonary-aspergillosis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Key-risk-factors-influencing-mortality-rates-in-chronic-pulmonary-aspergillosis- Patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc136bd9-35de-476b-9d56-17490b966da3 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 07:08:00 -0500 Key risk factors influencing mortality rates in chronic pulmonary aspergillosis patients
随着特朗普上台，支持者们期待各州发起医疗债务斗争由于担心当选总统唐纳德·特朗普会削弱联邦政府解决国家医疗债务问题的努力，患者和消费者权益倡导者正在寻求各州帮助那些无力承担医疗费用或偿还债务的人们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/With-Trump-on-the-way-advocates-look-to-states-to-pick-up-medical-debt-fight.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/With-Trump-on-the-way-advocates-look-to-states-to-pick-up-medical-debt-fight.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82d09f9a-8017-4a88-aa7c-5fa4660e3f87 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 07:05:51 -0500 With Trump on the way, advocates look to states to pick up medical debt fight
疗养院行业希望特朗普废除人员配置命令新冠病毒在该国疗养院的肆虐导致超过 172,000 名居民死亡，并引发了数十年来最大规模的行业改革：强制要求疗养院雇用最低数量的护士。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Nursing-home-industry-wants-trump-to-rescind-staffing-mandate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Nursing-home-industry-wants-trump-to-rescind-staffing-mandate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90efa2a5-5b41-40e8-8678-75a27438c4fc Tue, 03 Dec 2024 06:59:45 -0500 Nursing home industry wants trump to rescind staffing mandate
随着心理健康法庭在全州范围内推出，加州未达到入学目标加州强制对该州一些最严重的精神疾病居民（其中许多人流落街头）进行治疗的新举措未能实现其最初目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/California-falling-short-of-enrollment-goal-as-mental-health-courts-roll-out-statewide.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/California-falling-short-of-enrollment-goal-as-mental-health-courts-roll-out-statewide.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08eca7c9-c9d1-4517-abf6-a967b1b3cadb Tue, 03 Dec 2024 06:57:58 -0500 California falling short of enrollment goal as mental health courts roll out statewide
Beckman Coulter Life Sciences 推出 Cydem VT 自动克隆筛选系统，加速药物发现https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-Accelerates-Drug-Discovery-with-Launch-of-Cydem-VT-Automated-Clone-Screening-System.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Beckman-Coulter-Life-Sciences-Accelerates-Drug-Discovery-with-Launch-of-Cydem-VT-Automated-Clone-Screening-System.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0695198-7080-4f47-b577-f3b8fac71547 Tue, 03 Dec 2024 04:22:00 -0500 Beckman Coulter Life Sciences Accelerates Drug Discovery with Launch of Cydem VT Automated Clone Screening System
肽模拟物作为调节 Aurora-A 和抗癌的新策略一种针对参与细胞分裂的蛋白质的新方法揭示了对其功能的新见解，该蛋白质可能在癌症中功能失调。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Peptidomimetics-as-a-new-strategy-to-modulate-Aurora-A-and-combat-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Peptidomimetics-as-a-new-strategy-to-modulate-Aurora-A-and-combat-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a5c5a9d2-0c1e-458c-af86-138f6b44d13d Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:51:10 -0500 Peptidomimetics as a new strategy to modulate Aurora-A and combat cancer
酮代谢重新定义衰老大脑中的蛋白质质量控​​制酮体由身体在禁食期间产生以提供燃料，除了能量产生之外，还具有调节细胞过程和衰老机制的作用。巴克研究所的研究表明，酮体最好被理解为影响衰老和阿尔茨海默氏病大脑功能的强大信号代谢物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Ketone-metabolism-redefines- Protein-quality-control-in-aging-brains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Ketone-metabolism-redefines- Protein-quality-control-in-aging-brains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9e3418a-b333-4b09-a554-8d581964e75b Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:42:05 -0500 Ketone metabolism redefines protein quality control in aging brains
生物相容性液体墨水使头皮印刷电极能够用于非侵入性脑电图科学家首次发明了一种液体墨水，医生可以将其打印到患者的头皮上以测量大脑活动。该技术于 12 月 2 日发表在 Cell Press 杂志《细胞生物材料》上，为目前用于监测脑电波和诊断神经系统疾病的繁琐过程提供了一种有希望的替代方案。它还具有增强非侵入性脑机接口应用的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Biocompany-liquid-ink-enables-scalp-printed-electrodes-for-non-guarantee-EEG.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241203/Biocompany-liquid-ink-enables-scalp-printed-electrodes-for-non-guarantee-EEG.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5d4d217e-4267-4526-a3cc-a2fb2a991fdb Tue, 03 Dec 2024 01:34:03 -0500 Biocompatible liquid ink enables scalp-printed electrodes for non-invasive EEG
